items.title: Gaza air strikes follow heaviest rocket fire by Hamas in months
items.description: A journalist is reportedly killed in a strike at a hospital compound after 10 rockets are fired into Israel.

items.title: Watch: Deadly storm system brings flooding to US South and Midwest
items.description: Severe weather hit parts of the US as forecasters warned that swollen rivers pose a danger even after the rain stops.

items.title: Myanmar fighting continues despite post-earthquake ceasefires
items.description: The UN received reports that Myanmar's military had conducted attacks, while the military accused rebels of the same.

items.title: Myanmar fighting continues despite post-earthquake ceasefires
items.description: The UN received reports that Myanmar's military had conducted attacks, while the military accused rebels of the same.

items.title: Thousands attend funeral of Malian star Amadou Bagayoko
items.description: The blind musician, who helped bring Malian music to the world in the 2000s, died last week aged 70.
